Package org.pepstock.charba.client.data

Class CanvasObjectHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.plugins.AbstractBasePlugin
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.plugins.SmartPlugin
          • org.pepstock.charba.client.data.CanvasObjectHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BeforeDestroyHook, ConfigureHook, ResizeHook
    final class CanvasObjectHandler
extends SmartPlugin
implements ConfigureHook, ResizeHook, BeforeDestroyHook
    Internal plugin, set by data object before a chart is initializing.
    This plugin is added to the chart ONLY if the data set is configured to have patterns and gradients.
    It cleans up where the chart is destroyed or resized.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
